name: The Ward (itch)
description:
Abandon hope all ye who enter here.

Abandon sense and instinct.

Not all is as it seems.

Gather your wits.

Enter The Ward.

NOTEWe encountered a lot of set-backs and team changes. The current game is the result of four days work between only three people. The Dinner Scene is not yet implemented so if you reach that point you have seen all there is in the game, but we appreciate you taking the time to play nonetheless. Controls:

When an Eye appears, Press E

 To lift or drop certain objects, Press left click

Press F to toggle the flashlight

Credits:

Code and Technical Animation - El Fideo Rubio

Character Artist - John Berlin Almanon

Level Design - El Fideo Rubio, Nicholas Kumashov.

Music - Nicholas Kumashov

Sound Design - Nicholas Kumashov and Scott Stinson

Voices - Lachlan Underwood, Freya Dahlstrom, Nicholas Kumashov

Thumbnail by Freya Dahlstrom
